aws_waf_rule.description: Provides a AWS WAF rule resource.

metric_name.description: The name or description for the Amazon CloudWatch metric of this rule. The name can contain only alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9); the name can't contain whitespace.

name.description: The name or description of the rule.

predicates.description: The objects to include in a rule (documented below).

id.description: The ID of the WAF rule.

arn.description: The ARN of the WAF rule.
